item.title: 'Experimenting with content' by Sattvik Mishra
item.description: â€‹ Talk: Sattvik Mishra: Experimenting with content Who: ScoopWhoop CEO SOTS: Traditional media houses prioritizes news for you (in a generic way, by giving more space on newspaper and time on tv-shows, also by ordering and grouping same genre together) News is subjective, for some it could be a spoiler in game of thrones, for others it could be sports. To create awareness on unconventional topics, make it relatable. For example: budget to 18yo
